body.p: The Wine development release 1.1.23 is now available.

ul.li: Support for registering MIME types with the Linux desktop.
FBO mode is now the default for Direct3D.
Improved support for the Mingw cross-compile.
Proper fullscreen mode for the virtual desktop.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
